revision.text:
{{Infobox settlement| settlement_type = [[City of regional significance (Ukraine)|City]]| subdivision_type = Country | official_name = Brianka| native_name = Брянка| pushpin_map = Ukraine Lugansk Oblast#Ukraine| pushpin_map1= | |pushpin_label_position = left | subdivision_name = | image_flag = File:Flag of Bryanka.png| image_shield = File:Coat of Arms of Bryanka.gif|thumb|Coat of Arms of Bryanka| subdivision_type1 = Oblast| region_type_local = Raion| region_link = region_name_local = | population_total = 47512| population_as_of = 2013| area_total_km2 = 63,5| established_date = 1696| established_title = Founded| established_date1 = 1962| established_title1 = City status| elevation_m = 183 |coordinates = {{coord|48|30|48|N|38|38|35|E|region:UA_type:city|display=inline,title}} | blank_name = [[Köppen climate classification|Climate]] | blank_info = [[Humid continental climate#Mild/cool summer subtype|Dfb]] | website = http://bryanka-rada.gov.ua| image_map = }} '''Brianka''' ({{lang-uk|Брянка}}) is a city in [[Luhansk Oblast]] ([[oblast|region]]) of [[Ukraine]]. It is incorporated as a [[city of regional significance (Ukraine)|city of oblast significance]]. Population: {{Ua-pop-est2013|47,512}}. [[File:Maryin cliff in Brianka, Ukraine.jpg|thumb|left|Maryin cliff in Brianka]]
== History == City since December 1962.<ref>Брянка // Большой энциклопедический словарь (в 2-х тт.). / редколл., гл. ред. А. М. Прохоров. том 1. М., "Советская энциклопедия", 1991. стр.171</ref>
A local newspaper is published in the city since April 1965.<ref>№ 2901. «Труд горняка» // Летопись периодических и продолжающихся изданий СССР 1986 - 1990. Часть 2. Газеты. М., «Книжная палата», 1994. стр.381</ref>
Since 2014, Brianka has been located on the territory of the [[Luhansk People's Republic]] and is not controlled by Ukrainian authorities.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://gkslg.info/files/chisl_0915.pdf|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160204211939/http://gkslg.info/files/chisl_0915.pdf|url-status=dead|archive-date=4 February 2016|title=Численность населения по состоянию на 1 октября 2015 года по Луганской Народной Республ ике|publisher=[[Luhansk People's Republic]]|language=Russian|accessdate=21 December 2015}}</ref>
== Demographics == As of the [[Ukrainian Census (2001)|Ukrainian Census of 2001]]:<ref>[http://www.ukrcensus.gov.ua]</ref>
;Ethnicity * Ukrainians: 54.9% * Russians: 42.7% * Belarusians: 0.8%
;Language *[[Russian language|Russian]]: 87.01% *[[Ukrainian language|Ukrainian]]: 12.65% *[[Belarusian language|Belarusian]]: 0.09%
